note: I'm a video artist specialized in animation, with experience at animation studios. I've taught VFX and specialize in After Effects. As a video artist, I directed animated and live-action music videos. Currently, I work as a full-time editor and cameraman for Kinepolis Studio, direct freelance projects, and run the non-profit organization Slammer!, focused on animation and fine arts. I also give occasional guest lectures on film and animation.
